original_text: Now when all this was finished, all Israel who were present went out to the cities of Judah and broke in pieces the pillars and cut down the Asherim and broke down the high places and the altars throughout all Judah and Benjamin, and in Ephraim and Manasseh, until they had destroyed them all. Then all the people of Israel returned to their cities, every man to his possession.
korean_text: 이 모든 일이 끝나매 거기에 있는 이스라엘 무리가 나가서 유다 여러 성읍에 이르러 주상들을 깨뜨리며 아세라 목상들을 찍으며 유다와 베냐민과 에브라임과 므낫세 온 땅에서 산당들과 제단들을 제거하여 없애고 이스라엘 모든 자손이 각각 자기들의 본성 기업으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: Now when all this was finished
went out to the cities of Judah
and broke in pieces the pillars
and broke down the high places
and the altars throughout all Judah and Benjamin
sentences.korean_translation: 유다와 베냐민 온 땅에 있는 제단들을

sentences.original_text: until they had destroyed them all
Then all the people of Israel returned to their cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 이스라엘 모든 백성이 각각 그 성읍으로 돌아가니
